articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Celine Dion cancels North American tour over ongoing health concerns - ABC News
articles.description: After an extended pause, Celine Dion is forced to cancel the North American leg of her world tour over a longer-than-expected recovery from muscle spasms.
articles.content:
Canadian superstar Celine Dion has announced she will not be able to perform the North America leg of her "Courage World Tour" due to persistent health problems.
<ul><li>The tour was first paused in… [+1323 chars]

articles.title: ريال مدريد يفسح المجال لبرشلونة.. قرار بالخروج من سباق ضم هالاند! - Goal.com
articles.description: The American star has missed several months after suffering a hamstring injury during World Cup qualifiers.

articles.author: Zeke Miller
articles.title: After Biden's first year, the virus and disunity rage on - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — From the inaugural platform, President Joe Biden saw American sickness on two fronts — a disease of the national spirit and the one from the rampaging coronavirus — and he saw hope, because leaders always must see that.
